name: Which Witch Hat
description:
Which witch is which and which witch's witch hat switch will win?

In an old magical library four witches are arguing about the amount of lizard bile use in a love potion. Obviously the only way to settle such an important disagreement is a battle to the death! Which witch will prove to wear the biggest hat?

Game mechanics:

Four player local brawl.

Witches locked in a room battle until only one is alive by shooting star spells at each other. Pick up a sandwich to swap hat colour with the next player you shoot. Pick up a potion to make all hats the same colour next time you shoot anyone.

Made by : Daniel Kierkegaard Andersen,  Cathrine Vagna jensen, Lawrence Spendrup, Christian Svinth-Johansen, Theodor Hansen, Johan
